archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.10: Details relating to the processing of PII should be recorded in a manner that complies with relevant legislation (e.g. the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR) and the US Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
